description.summary: Development files for the Network Security Service libraries
description.p: This is a set of libraries designed to support cross-platform development of security-enabled client and server applications. It can support SSLv2 and v4, TLS, PKCS #5, #7, #11, #12, S/MIME, X.509 v3 certificates and other security standards.
Install this package if you wish to develop your own programs using the Network Security Service Libraries.
